title: (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977), hereby order as follows:
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Delegation of Ministerial
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Health (Delegation of Ministerial 

Functions) (No. 2) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited health (delegation ministerial functions) (no 2) order 2024

title: (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977), hereby order as follows:
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 

the Minister for Health conferred on him – 

(a) 

by or under the enactments specified in Part 1 of the Schedule, 
and 

(b) under the enactments specified in Part 2 of the Schedule, 

are delegated to Colm Burke, Minister of State at the Department of Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 10th May, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [210] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister health conferred - (a) enactment specified part 1 schedule (b) enactment specified part 2 schedule delegated colm burke minister state department health notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 10th may 2024 210 3

title: (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977), hereby order as follows:
heading: Sections 5, 14, 20, 34 and 51 of the Food Safety Authority of Ireland Act 1998
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

PART 1 

Sections 5, 14, 20, 34 and 51 of the Food Safety Authority of Ireland Act 1998 
(No. 29 of 1998) 

Food Standards Act 1974 (No. 11 of 1974) 

Part V and section 5, in so far as it relates to Part V, of the Health Act 1947 (No. 
28 of 1947) 

Milk and Dairies Acts 1935 to 1988 

Misuse of Drugs Acts 1977 to 2017 

Protection of Children's Health (Tobacco Smoke in Mechanically Propelled 
Vehicles) Act 2014 (No. 40 of 2014) 

Public Health (Sunbeds) Act 2014 (No. 12 of 2014) 

Public Health (Tobacco) Acts 2002 to 2023 

Tobacco (Health Promotion and Protection) Act 1988 (No. 24 of 1988) 

Tobacco Products (Control of Advertising, Sponsorship and Sales Promotion) 
Act 1978 (No. 27 of 1978). 

PART 2 

European Communities (Control of Drug Precursors) Regulations 2009 (S.I. No. 
558 of 2009) 

European Union (Manufacture, Presentation and Sale of Tobacco and Related 
Products) Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 271 of 2016) 

Misuse of Drugs (Licence Fees) Regulations 1979 (S.I. No. 164 of 1979) Misuse 
of Drugs Regulations 2017 (S.I. No. 173 of 2017) 

Misuse of Drugs (Supervision of Prescription and Supply of Methadone and 
for Opioid 
Medicinal Products containing Buprenorphine authorised 
Substitution Treatment) Regulations 2017 (S.I. No. 522 of 2017). 

GIVEN under the Official Seal 
of the Government, 

7 May, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [210]
text_norm: schedule part 1 section 5 14 20 34 51 food safety authority ireland act 1998 (no 29 1998) food standard act 1974 (no 11 1974) part v section 5 far relates part v health act 1947 (no 28 1947) milk dairy act 1935 1988 misuse drug act 1977 2017 protection child health (tobacco smoke mechanically propelled vehicles) act 2014 (no 40 2014) public health (sunbeds) act 2014 (no 12 2014) public health (tobacco) act 2002 2023 tobacco (health promotion protection) act 1988 (no 24 1988) tobacco product (control advertising sponsorship sale promotion) act 1978 (no 27 1978) part 2 european community (control drug precursors) regulation 2009 (s.i no 558 2009) european union (manufacture presentation sale tobacco related products) regulation 2016 (s.i no 271 2016) misuse drug (licence fees) regulation 1979 (s.i no 164 1979) misuse drug regulation 2017 (s.i no 173 2017) misuse drug (supervision prescription supply methadone opioid medicinal product containing buprenorphine authorised substitution treatment) regulation 2017 (s.i no 522 2017) given official seal government 7 may 2024 simon harris taoiseach 4 210

title: (Amendment) (No. 2) Act 1977 (No. 28 of 1977), hereby order as follows:
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

The Health (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) (No.2) Order 2024 delegates 
to Colm Burke, Minister of State at the Department of Health the statutory 
powers and duties of the Minister for Health mentioned in the Order. 

 
 
 
 
 
 [210] 5
